snippet: Unlocking the Truth, a trio of middle-schoolers who make blunt rock music, defies expectations as it gets closer to making its metal dreams come true.
abstract: Brooklyn heavy metal band Unlocking the Truth is comprised of middle-schoolers, but members Alec Atkins, Malcolm Brickhouse and Jarad Dawkins are clear about their dedication to heavy music and rejection of boy band aesthetic aimed at kid audiences; band has defied expectations in number of ways, from their choice of musical influences to their breakaway success.
lead_paragraph: Unlocking the Truth, a trio of middle-schoolers who make blunt rock music, defies expectations as it gets closer to making its metal dreams come true.

headline.seo: Unlocking the Truth Is a Band That Rocks Beyond Its Years
headline.main: A Heavy Metal Alloy, Fused With Youth
headline.print_headline: A Heavy Metal Alloy, Fused With Youth
